A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I went in with zero expectations and was pleasantly entertained\, but after leaving the theater and thinking back on what exactly I just watched\, the sad realization of how poorly written the story and dialogue was came upon me. The acting was stellar from beginning to end. The all star cast did a great job with what they had to work with\, but all in all\, this movie isn't great or even close to a master piece. It's an okay Star Wars Disney fan fiction. Here's hoping that Episode IX will somehow be salvageable from the mess this movie created. JJ Abrams\, please do a better job and save this franchise.
